pages.text: $(li)The Witherite Ingot is an even harder material than the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/end_crystal_ingot)End Crystal Ingot$(/l).$(br)$(li)It seems that it can be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/wither)Wither$(/l) on death.$(br)$(li)This material can be used to forge the $(l:patchouli:weapons/final_fractal)Final Fractal$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l).
